trans-unit.source: Specifies the data loss mode for Testability actions.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the data loss mode for Testability actions.

trans-unit.source: Only a quorum of replicas including the primary will be cleaned up.
trans-unit.target: Only a quorum of replicas including the primary will be cleaned up.

trans-unit.source: Whether actual data loss occurs depends on whether there was any data being replicated at that time and if the replicas which were removed were further ahead of the ones not removed.
trans-unit.target: Whether actual data loss occurs depends on whether there was any data being replicated at that time and if the replicas which were removed were further ahead of the ones not removed.

trans-unit.source: All the replicas for the partition will be cleaned up hence there should be no state left in the partition after the API call and recovery will be required.
trans-unit.target: All the replicas for the partition will be cleaned up hence there should be no state left in the partition after the API call and recovery will be required.
